flavors.Sword: It has the world's largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.

flavors.Emerald: Parasect are known to infest the roots of large trees en masse and drain nutrients. When an infested tree dies, they move onto another tree all at once.

flavors.Yellow: It is born with the ability to defy gravity. It floats in air on powerful electromagnetic waves.

flavors.Sword: Its shell is extremely hard. It cannot be shattered, even with a bomb. The shell opens only when it is attacking.

flavors.White 2: Lanturn's light can shine up from great depths. It is nicknamed "The Deep-Sea Star."
flavors.Diamond: Lanturn's light can shine up from great depths. It is nicknamed "The Deep-Sea Star."
flavors.Stadium 2: The light it emits is so bright that it can illuminate the sea's surface from a depth of over three miles.
flavors.Sapphire: Lanturn is known to emit light. If you peer down into the dark sea from a ship at night, you can sometimes see this Pokémon's light rising from the depths where it swims. It gives the sea an appearance of a starlit night.
flavors.Ruby: Lanturn is nicknamed "the deep-sea star" for its illuminated antenna. This Pokémon produces light by causing a chemical reaction between bacteria and its bodily fluids inside the antenna.
flavors.Silver: It blinds prey with an intense burst of light, then swallows the immobilized prey in a single gulp.
flavors.Sun: Should you peer into the ocean at night and see a light shining like the stars, that is Lanturn.
flavors.Moon: This Pokémon flashes a bright light that blinds its prey. This creates an opening for it to deliver an electrical attack.
flavors.Ultra Sun: When the bacteria living inside its antennae absorb Lanturn's bodily fluids, a strong luminescent effect is produced.
flavors.Ultra Moon: It lives far down in the depths of the ocean. It blinds its prey with light, using the moment they're dazzled to swallow them whole.
flavors.Sword: The light it emits is so bright that it can illuminate the sea's surface from a depth of over three miles.
flavors.Shield: This Pokémon flashes a bright light that blinds its prey. This creates an opening for it to deliver an electrical attack.

flavors.Y: It is not yet skilled at storing electricity. It may send out a jolt if amused or startled.

flavors.Emerald: It is still inept at retaining electricity. When it is startled, it discharges power accidentally. It gets better at holding power as it grows older.

flavors.Platinum: It appears as if it is skating on water. It draws prey with a sweet scent from the tip of its head.

flavors.Black: It toughens its body by slamming into thick trees. Many snapped trees can be found near its nest.

flavors.Ultra Moon: With its sturdy jaws and fangs, it can easily chomp wooden boats to splinters. It fights with Basculin over food.

flavors.FireRed: The ruffian of the seas, it has fangs that crunch through iron. It swims by jetting water from its rear.
flavors.Ruby: Nicknamed "the bully of the sea," Sharpedo is widely feared. Its cruel fangs grow back immediately if they snap off. Just one of these Pokémon can thoroughly tear apart a supertanker.
flavors.Alpha Sapphire: Sharpedo can swim at speeds of up to 75 mph by jetting seawater out of its backside. This Pokémon’s drawback is its inability to swim long distances.

flavors.FireRed: When it sucks in a large volume of seawater, it becomes like a big, bouncy ball. It eats a ton of food daily.

flavors.Emerald: While this Pokémon usually lives in the sea, it can survive on land, although not too long. It loses vitality if its body becomes dried out.

flavors.LeafGreen: It generates ultrasonic waves by violently flapping its wings. After making its prey faint, it melts the prey with acid.
flavors.HeartGold: It vibrates its wings vigorously, creating ultrasonic waves that cause serious headaches.
flavors.X: The ultrasonic waves it generates by rubbing its two wings together cause severe headaches.
flavors.White 2: The ultrasonic waves it generates by rubbing its two wings together cause severe headaches.
flavors.Diamond: It violently shudders its wings, generating ultrasonic waves to induce headaches in people.
flavors.Y: It generates ultrasonic waves by violently flapping its wings. After making its prey faint, it melts the prey with acid.
flavors.Omega Ruby: To make prey faint, Vibrava generates ultrasonic waves by vigorously making its two wings vibrate. This Pokémon’s ultrasonic waves are so powerful, they can bring on headaches in people.
flavors.Sapphire: Vibrava's wings have not yet completed the process of growing. Rather than flying long distances, they are more useful for generating ultrasonic waves by vibrating.
flavors.White: It violently shudders its wings, generating ultrasonic waves to induce headaches in people.
flavors.Pearl: It violently shudders its wings, generating ultrasonic waves to induce headaches in people.
flavors.Sun: Rather than using its underdeveloped wings for flight, it rubs them together, producing ultrasonic waves to attack its enemies.
flavors.Moon: To help make its wings grow, it dissolves quantities of prey in its digestive juices and guzzles them down every day.
flavors.Ultra Sun: It vibrates its wings to generate ultrasonic waves, causing its prey to faint. Then it buries the prey alive in the sand to preserve it.

flavors.Shield: To help make its wings grow, it dissolves quantities of prey in its digestive juices and guzzles them down every day.

flavors.Black: Rumored to sense disasters with its horn, it became a target. It fled deep into the mountains.
flavors.FireRed: It appears when it senses an impending natural disaster. As a result, it was mistaken as a doom-bringer.
flavors.Ruby: Every time Absol appears before people, it is followed by a disaster such as an earthquake or a tidal wave. As a result, it came to be known as the disaster Pokémon.
flavors.Alpha Sapphire: Absol has the ability to foretell the coming of natural disasters. It lives in a harsh, rugged mountain environment. This Pokémon very rarely ventures down from the mountains.
flavors.SoulSilver: It has the ability to foretell natural disasters. Its life span is over a hundred years.
flavors.Platinum: Rumored to sense danger with its horn, it became a target. It fled deep into the mountains.
flavors.Emerald: It sharply senses even subtle changes in the sky and the land to predict natural disasters. It is a long-lived Pokémon that has a life-span of 100 years.

flavors.Ultra Moon: The elderly call it the disaster Pokémon and detest it, but interest in its power to predict disasters is on the rise.

flavors.FireRed: It is said that a home visited by a Snorunt will prosper. It can withstand cold of minus 150 degrees Fahrenheit..

flavors.Sapphire: Glalie has the ability to freely control ice. For example, it can instantly freeze its foe solid. After immobilizing its foe in ice, this Pokémon enjoys eating it in leisurely fashion.
flavors.White: It prevents prey from escaping by instantaneously freezing moisture in the air.
flavors.Pearl: To protect itself, it clads its body in an armor of ice, made by freezing moisture in the air.
flavors.Sun: Legend says a boulder on an icy mountain absorbed the distress and regrets of a stranded mountaineer, giving rise to Glalie.
flavors.Moon: Its prey is instantaneously frozen stiff by the cold air it exhales from its huge mouth. While they're in that frozen state, it gobbles them up.

flavors.Sword: It has a body of ice that won't melt, even with fire. It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere.
flavors.Shield: It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere. It uses this power to freeze its foes.
